suffering from or relating to schizophrenia (= a serious mental illness): There are about 7.9 million schizophrenic patients worldwide. If you begin to experience schizophrenic symptoms, you may not be able to judge that they are unusual.
having qualities or attitudes that are different from each other and that do not work well together: Decorated in a somewhat schizophrenic Moroccan/Asian theme, the hotel's rooms seem slightly dated. There's something a little schizophrenic about the menu.
